column1: Friends may call at the Rainey-Mathis Funeral Home in Dexter on Friday
column3: 2015 from 5:00 P.M. until 8:00 P.M. Funeral services will then be conducted on Saturday
column5: 2015 at 2:00P.M. in the Rainey-Mathis Funeral Chapel with Rev. Dean Williams officiating. Interment will follow in the Chalk Bluff Cemetery.
